title: RRB Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 272 Nursing Superintendent Posts
description: The Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 272 Nursing Superintendent Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their GNM, B.Sc Nursing can apply for the RRB Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee,...
